public class Planet
extends javax.swing.JLabel
planet defined with a lot of properties to be used in the frame

  • Constructor Details

    • Planet

      public Planet​(double startX, double startY, double sunX, double sunY, double radius, java.awt.Color color)
      constructor for the Planet class
      Parameters:
      startX - starting X value of the planet
      startY - starting Y value of the planet
      sunX - current X value of the sun
      sunY - current Y value of the sun
      radius - radius of the planet
      color - the color the planet should be colored
